General.Name: iBX Group Inc
General.Description: IBX Group, Inc. provides administrative services, and network support and maintenance to clients primarily in the healthcare sector of the United States. The company operates in two segments, Healthcare Transaction Management and Technology (HTMT) services, and Physical Therapy and Rehabilitation (PTR) services. The HTMT services segment provides the healthcare industry with administrative services and technology development, including physicians practice management, billing and collections, network services, transcription services, staffing solutions, and software application development. The PTR services segment operates multi disciplinary clinics offering physical therapy, occupational medicine, pain management, chiropractic care, and wellness services. The company was founded in 1997 as Vidkid Distribution, Inc. and changed its name to IBX Group, Inc. IBX Group is based in Deerfield Beach, Florida.
General.Address: 350 Jim Moran Boulevard, Deerfield Beach, FL, United States, 33442
